Description: Exist any trace from Sydney1 to Perth1.
Exist a trace from Sydney2 to Armidale through any sub trace.
Exist a trace from Sydney2 to Armidale through any sub trace with minimum two hops, such that the (Sydney2, Armidale)-link is omitted.
Exist any trace from Canberra2 to Canberra1 not using the (Canberra2, Canberra1)-link.
